   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to IRIS Client's documentation!
============================================

The IRIS Client is a python client that allows users to easily interact with the IRIS API.
Examples are available in the `examples` folder. An `API key <https://docs.dfir-iris.org/operations/api/>`_ is required to use the client.
The API reference is available on the `documentation website <https://docs.dfir-iris.org/operations/api/#references>`_.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   session
   case
   admin
   customer
   global_search
   users
   helpers
